Html:
I'm developing a stock market candle graph application, and I need to remove the time in between trading days on the x axis. (4:00 PM to 9:30 AM) I want the data to flow continuously without awkward spaces for that time period. Has anyone come up with a solution or something similar to this? Any point in the right direction would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

I can use either HorizontalDateTimeAxis, or NumericAxis as x.

I figured this out and posted my answer here:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12937164/dynamic-data-display-scattered-datetime-axis
